page.title: 10Food and Shopping
page.content: The diet of people in this area is traditional rather than exotic. Their food comes generally from 4 sources:l. home produced, 2. village shops near to the area, 3. supermarkets in nearby towns, 4. markets in nearby towns. Major shopping is usually done once a week in Shrewsbury or Telford. For minor shopping, general stores in nearby large villages are used. Most homes will use homegrown vegetables and fruit, and there is a growing use of freezers to extend the season. Some fruit and vegetables are bought at markets and some people sell their own produce there. Poultry and rabbits are often reared at home, eventually destined for the table.
